name: Lexus NX
description: The price of Lexus NX, a 5 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 67.35  - 74.24 Lakh. It is available in 4 variants, with an engine of 2487 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. NX has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 8 airbags. Lexus NX has a ground clearance of 195 mm  and is available in 12 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 17.8 kmpl for NX.

variants.variant_name: NX 350h Exquisite 2487 cc, Hybrid (Electric + Petrol), Automatic (e-CVT), 17.8 kmpl, 188 bhp
